summary.para: Registers to receive notification of changes whenever the adapter enumeration state changes.

param.name: hEvent
param.para: A handle to the event object.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.para: A key value for the registered event.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise.

summary.para: Unregisters an event to stop receiving notifications when the adapter enumeration state changes.

param.name: dwCookie
param.para: A key value for the event to unregister.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise.

summary.para: This interface enables registration for notifications to detect adapter enumeration state changes.
